name: testpilot-containers
title: Multi-Account Containers
description: Containers helps you keep all the parts of your online life contained in different tabs. Custom labels and color-coded tabs help keep different activities — like online shopping, travel planning, or checking work email — separate.
author: Andrea Marchesini, Luke Crouch and Jonathan Kingston

scripts.build: npm test && cd src && web-ext build --overwrite-dest
scripts.package: rm -rf src/web-ext-artifacts && npm run build && mv src/web-ext-artifacts/firefox_multi-account_containers-*.zip addon.xpi
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
